mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xueshengkaoqin_types as xueshengkaoqinTypes ,a.xueshengkaoqin_content as xueshengkaoqinContent ,a.kaoqin_time as kaoqinTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney
FROM xueshengkaoqin a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xueshengkaoqin_types = #{params.xueshengkaoqinTypes}
and a.xueshengkaoqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengkaoqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
